Class Hierarchy

  • zinnia.admin.widgets.MPTTFilteredSelectMultiple.Media: MPTTFilteredSelectMultiple's Media
  • zinnia.models.Entry.Meta: Entry's Meta
  • zinnia.models.Author.Meta: Author's Meta

  • zinnia.admin.forms.EntryAdminForm.Meta: EntryAdminForm's Meta
  • zinnia.admin.forms.CategoryAdminForm.Meta: CategoryAdminForm's Meta
  • zinnia.models.Category.Meta: Category's Meta
  • markupbase.ParserBase: Parser base class which provides some common support methods used by the SGML/HTML and XHTML parsers.
    • sgmllib.SGMLParser
      • zinnia.feeds.ImgParser: Parser for getting IMG markups
  • object: The most base type
    • django.core.management.base.BaseCommand: The base class from which all management commands ultimately derive.
      • django.core.management.base.LabelCommand: A management command which takes one or more arbitrary arguments (labels) on the command line, and does something with each of them.
        • zinnia.management.commands.wp2zinnia.Command: Command object for importing a WordPress blog into Zinnia via a WordPress eXtended RSS (WXR) file.
      • django.core.management.base.NoArgsCommand: A command which takes no arguments on the command line.
        • zinnia.management.commands.spam_cleanup.Command: Command object for removing comments flagged as spam
        • zinnia.management.commands.zinnia2wp.Command: Command object for exporting a Zinnia blog into WordPress via a WordPress eXtended RSS (WXR) file.
    • exceptions.BaseException: Common base class for all exceptions
      • exceptions.Exception: Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
        • django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned: The query returned multiple objects when only one was expected.
          • zinnia.models.Category.MultipleObjectsReturned
          • zinnia.models.Entry.MultipleObjectsReturned
          • django.contrib.auth.models.User.MultipleObjectsReturned
            • zinnia.models.Author.MultipleObjectsReturned
        • django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist: The requested object does not exist
          • zinnia.models.Category.DoesNotExist
          • django.contrib.auth.models.User.DoesNotExist
            • zinnia.models.Author.DoesNotExist
          • zinnia.models.Entry.DoesNotExist
    • django.contrib.admin.options.BaseModelAdmin: Functionality common to both ModelAdmin and InlineAdmin.
      • django.contrib.admin.options.ModelAdmin: Encapsulates all admin options and functionality for a given model.
        • zinnia.admin.category.CategoryAdmin: Admin for Category model
        • zinnia.admin.entry.EntryAdmin: Admin for Entry model
    • calendar.Calendar: Base calendar class.
      • calendar.HTMLCalendar: This calendar returns complete HTML pages.
        • zinnia.templatetags.zcalendar.ZinniaCalendar: Override of HTMLCalendar
    • zinnia.comparison.ClusteredModel: Wrapper around Model class building a dataset of instances
    • django.contrib.comments.moderation.CommentModerator: Encapsulates comment-moderation options for a given model.
      • zinnia.moderator.EntryCommentModerator: Moderate the comment of Entry
    • zinnia.templatetags.zbreadcrumbs.Crumb: Part of the Breadcrumbs
    • django.contrib.syndication.views.Feed
      • zinnia.feeds.EntryDiscussions: Feed for discussions in an entry
        • zinnia.feeds.AtomEntryDiscussions: Atom feed for discussions in an entry
        • zinnia.feeds.EntryComments: Feed for comments in an entry
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomEntryComments: Atom feed for comments in an entry
        • zinnia.feeds.EntryPingbacks: Feed for pingbacks in an entry
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomEntryPingbacks: Atom feed for pingbacks in an entry
        • zinnia.feeds.EntryTrackbacks: Feed for trackbacks in an entry
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomEntryTrackbacks: Atom feed for trackbacks in an entry
      • zinnia.feeds.EntryFeed: Base Entry Feed
        • zinnia.feeds.AuthorEntries: Feed filtered by an author
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomAuthorEntries: Atom feed filtered by an author
        • zinnia.feeds.CategoryEntries: Feed filtered by a category
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomCategoryEntries: Atom feed filtered by a category
        • zinnia.feeds.LatestEntries: Feed for the latest entries
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomLatestEntries: Atom feed for the latest entries
        • zinnia.feeds.SearchEntries: Feed filtered by a search pattern
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomSearchEntries: Atom feed filtered by a search pattern
        • zinnia.feeds.TagEntries: Feed filtered by a tag
          • zinnia.feeds.AtomTagEntries: Atom feed filtered by a tag
    • django.forms.fields.Field
      • django.forms.fields.ChoiceField
        • django.forms.models.ModelChoiceField: A ChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet.
          • django.forms.models.ModelMultipleChoiceField: A MultipleChoiceField whose choices are a model QuerySet.
            • zinnia.admin.widgets.MPTTModelMultipleChoiceField: MPTT version of ModelMultipleChoiceField
          • zinnia.admin.widgets.TreeNodeChoiceField: Duplicating the TreeNodeChoiceField bundled in django-mptt to avoid conflict with the TreeNodeChoiceField bundled in django-cms...
    • django.db.models.manager.Manager
      • zinnia.managers.AuthorPublishedManager: Manager to retrieve published authors
      • zinnia.managers.EntryPublishedManager: Manager to retrieve published entries
    • django.db.models.base.Model
      • zinnia.models.EntryAbstractClass: Base Model design for publishing entries
        • zinnia.models.Entry: Final Entry model
      • mptt.models.MPTTModel: Base class for tree models.
        • zinnia.models.Category: Category object for Entry
      • django.contrib.auth.models.User: Users within the Django authentication system are represented by this model.
        • zinnia.models.Author: Proxy Model around User
    • django.forms.models.ModelChoiceIterator
      • zinnia.admin.widgets.MPTTModelChoiceIterator: MPTT version of ModelChoiceIterator
    • django.contrib.sitemaps.Sitemap
      • zinnia.sitemaps.AuthorSitemap: Sitemap for authors
      • zinnia.sitemaps.CategorySitemap: Sitemap for categories
      • zinnia.sitemaps.EntrySitemap: Sitemap for entries
      • zinnia.sitemaps.TagSitemap: Sitemap for tags
    • django.utils.encoding.StrAndUnicode: A class whose __str__ returns its __unicode__ as a UTF-8 bytestring.
      • django.forms.forms.BaseForm
        • django.forms.models.BaseModelForm
          • django.forms.models.ModelForm
            • zinnia.admin.forms.CategoryAdminForm: Form for Category's Admin
            • zinnia.admin.forms.EntryAdminForm: Form for Entry's Admin
        • django.forms.forms.Form: A collection of Fields, plus their associated data.
          • django.contrib.admin.helpers.ActionForm
          • zinnia.views.quick_entry.QuickEntryForm: Form for posting an entry quickly
    • django.utils.feedgenerator.SyndicationFeed: Base class for all syndication feeds.
      • django.utils.feedgenerator.Atom1Feed
      • django.utils.feedgenerator.RssFeed
        • django.utils.feedgenerator.Rss201rev2Feed
    • zinnia.ping.URLRessources: Object defining the ressources of the website
    • zinnia.comparison.VectorBuilder: Build a list of vectors based on datasets
    • django.forms.widgets.Widget
      • django.forms.widgets.Input: Base class for all <input> widgets (except type='checkbox' and type='radio', which are special).
        • django.forms.widgets.HiddenInput
          • django.forms.widgets.MultipleHiddenInput: A widget that handles <input type="hidden"> for fields that have a list of values.
      • django.forms.widgets.Select
        • django.forms.widgets.SelectMultiple
          • django.contrib.admin.widgets.FilteredSelectMultiple: A SelectMultiple with a JavaScript filter interface.
            • zinnia.admin.widgets.MPTTFilteredSelectMultiple: MPTT version of FilteredSelectMultiple
    • threading._Verbose
      • threading.Thread
        • zinnia.ping.DirectoryPinger: Threaded Directory Pinger
        • zinnia.ping.ExternalUrlsPinger: Threaded ExternalUrls Pinger
    • type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
      • django.forms.forms.DeclarativeFieldsMetaclass: Metaclass that converts Field attributes to a dictionary called 'base_fields', taking into account parent class 'base_fields' as well.
      • django.forms.widgets.MediaDefiningClass: Metaclass for classes that can have media definitions
      • django.db.models.base.ModelBase: Metaclass for all models.
        • mptt.models.MPTTModelBase: Metaclass for MPTT models
      • django.forms.models.ModelFormMetaclass
